children.text:
Now, let's structure the Fortran code. First, declare variables:

program main
    implicit none
    character(len=1000) :: input_str, first_result, s2, s3
    integer ::
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
i, len, last_char_pos, cnt, tmp, pos, len_s2
    character :: last_char

    ! Read input
    read(*,'(A)') input_str

    ! Process first part
    len = len_trim(input_str) last_char = ' '
    do i = len, 1, -1
        if (input_str(i:i) /= ' ' .and. input_str(i:i) /= '?') then
            last_char = input_str(i:i)
            exit
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert to lowercase
    if (last_char >= 'A' .and. last_char <= 'Z') then
        last_char = char(ichar(last_char) + 32)
    end if

    if (last_char == 'a' .or. last_char == 'e' .or. last_char == 'i' .or. &
        last_char == 'o' .or. last_char == 'u' .or. last_char == 'y') then
        first_result = 'YES'
    else
        first_result = 'NO'
    end if

    ! Process second part
    s2 = first_result
    len_s2 = len_trim(s2)
    s3 = ' '
    pos = 1 do i = 1, len_s2 if (i < len_s2) then
            if (s2(i:i) == 'B' .and. s2(i+1:i+1) == 'C') then
                s3(pos:pos) = 'D'
                pos = pos +1
                i = i +1
            else
                s3(pos:pos) = s2(i:i)
                pos = pos +1
            end if
        else
            s3(pos:pos) = s2(i:i) pos = pos +1
        end if
    end do

    ! Now process s3 to compute cnt
    cnt =0
    tmp =0
    do i = 1, pos-1
        select case (s3(i:i))
            case ('A') tmp = tmp +1
            case ('D')
                cnt = cnt + tmp
            case default
                tmp =0
        end select
    end do

    !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Output the result
    print *, cnt

end program main

Initialize cnt =0, tmp=0.

Loop over each character in s3:

if char is 'A', then tmp +=1.

else if char is 'D', then cnt += tmp.

else, set tmp to 0.

So in Fortran:

integer :: cnt =0, tmp=0
character(len=1) :: current_char

do i = 1, len_trim(s3)
    current_char = s3(i:i)
    if (current_char == 'A') then
        tmp = tmp +1
    else if (current_char == 'D') then
        cnt = cnt + tmp
    else
        tmp =0
    end if
end do

Then, output cnt.

Putting all together.

Now, let's structure the Fortran code.

First, declare variables:

program main
    implicit none
    character(len=1000) :: input_str, first_result, s2, s3
    integer :: i, len, last_char_pos, cnt, tmp, pos, len_s2
    character :: last_char

    ! Read input
    read(*,'(A)') input_str

    ! Process first part
    len = len_trim(input_str)
    last_char = ' '
    do i = len, 1, -1
        if (input_str(i:i) /= ' ' .and. input_str(i:i) /= '?') then
            last_char = input_str(i:i)
            exit
        end if
    end do

    ! Convert to lowercase
    if (last_char >= 'A' .and. last_char <= 'Z') then
        last_char = char(ichar(last_char) + 32)
    end if

    if (last_char == 'a' .or. last_char == 'e' .or. last_char == 'i' .or. &
        last_char == 'o' .or. last_char == 'u' .or. last_char == 'y') then
        first_result = 'YES'
    else
        first_result = 'NO'
    end if

    ! Process second part
    s2 = first_result
    len_s2 = len_trim(s2)
    s3 = ' '
    pos = 1

    do i = 1, len_s2
        if (i < len_s2) then
            if (s2(i:i) == 'B' .and. s2(i+1:i+1) == 'C') then
                s3(pos:pos) = 'D'
                pos = pos +1
                i = i +1
            else
                s3(pos:pos) = s2(i:i)
                pos = pos +1
            end if
        else
            s3(pos:pos) = s2(i:i)
            pos = pos +1
        end if
    end do

    ! Now process s3 to compute cnt
    cnt =0
    tmp =0
    do i = 1, pos-1
        select case (s3(i:i))
            case ('A')
                tmp = tmp +1
            case ('D')
                cnt = cnt + tmp
            case default
                tmp =0
        end select
    end do

    ! Output the result
    print *, cnt

end program main

i=1:

Check if i < 3 (yes). Check if s2(1:1) is 'B' and s2(2:2) is 'C'. 'Y' and 'E' → no. So append 'Y' to s3 at pos 1. pos becomes 2.

i=2:

i <3 → yes. Check s2(2:2) is 'E', next is 'S'. Not BC → append 'E' to pos 2. pos becomes 3.

i=3:

i is not less than 3 (since len_s2 is 3). So append 'S' to pos3. pos becomes4.
